com.flipkart.*

  • com.flipkart.constant.SQLQueries
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    public static final java.lang.String DELETE_COURSE_QUERY "DELETE FROM courses WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String DELETE_LOGIN_QUERY "DELETE FROM logins WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String DELETE_NOTIFICATION_QUERY "DELETE FROM notifications WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String DELETE_PAYMENT_QUERY "DELETE FROM payments WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String DELETE_PROFESSOR_COURSE_QUERY "DELETE FROM professor_course WHERE professorId = ? AND courseId = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String DELETE_STUDENT_COURSE_QUERY "DELETE FROM student_course WHERE studentId = ? AND courseId = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String DELETE_USER_QUERY "DELETE FROM users WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_COURSE_QUERY "SELECT id, name, description, fees FROM courses WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_LOGIN_QUERY "SELECT id, username, password, approved FROM logins WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_NOTIFICATION_QUERY "SELECT id, userId, message, time FROM notifications WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_PAYMENT_QUERY "SELECT id, userId, amount, time FROM payments WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_PROFESSOR_COURSES_QUERY "SELECT * FROM professor_course WHERE professorId = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_STUDENT_COURSES_QUERY "SELECT * FROM student_course WHERE studentId = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_USER_QUERY "SELECT users.id AS id, users.name AS name, roles.name AS role FROM users LEFT JOIN roles ON roles.id = users.role where users.id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String INSERT_COURSE_QUERY "INSERT INTO courses (name, description, fees) VALUES (?, ?, ?)"
    public static final java.lang.String INSERT_LOGIN_QUERY "INSERT INTO logins (username, password, approved) VALUES (?, ?, ?)"
    public static final java.lang.String INSERT_NOTIFICATION_QUERY "INSERT INTO notifications (userId, message, time) VALUES (?, ?, NOW())"
    public static final java.lang.String INSERT_PAYMENT_QUERY "INSERT INTO payments (userId, amount, time) VALUES (?, ?, NOW())"
    public static final java.lang.String INSERT_PROFESSOR_COURSE_QUERY "INSERT INTO professor_course (professorId, courseId) VALUES (?, ?)"
    public static final java.lang.String INSERT_STUDENT_COURSE_QUERY "INSERT INTO student_course (studentId, courseId) VALUES (?, ?)"
    public static final java.lang.String INSERT_USER_QUERY "INSERT INTO users (id, name, role) VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), ?, ?)"
    public static final java.lang.String LIST_COURSES_QUERY "SELECT id, name, description, fees FROM courses"
    public static final java.lang.String LIST_LOGIN_QUERY "SELECT id, username, password, approved FROM logins"
    public static final java.lang.String LIST_NOTIFICATIONS_QUERY "SELECT id, userId, message, time FROM notifications WHERE userId = ? ORDER BY time DESC"
    public static final java.lang.String LIST_PAYMENTS_QUERY "SELECT id, userId, amount, time FROM payments WHERE userId = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String LIST_USERS_QUERY "SELECT users.id AS id, users.name AS name, roles.name AS role FROM users LEFT JOIN roles ON roles.id = users.role"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_COURSE_QUERY "UPDATE courses SET name = ?, description = ?, fees = ? WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_LOGIN_QUERY "UPDATE logins SET username = ?, password = ?, approved = ? WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_NOTIFICATION_QUERY "UPDATE notifications SET userId = ?, message = ?, time = ? WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_PAYMENT_QUERY "UPDATE payments SET userId = ?, amount = ?, time = ? WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_STUDENT_GRADE_QUERY "UPDATE student_course SET grade = ? WHERE courseId = ? AND studentId = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_USER_QUERY "UPDATE users SET name = ?, role = ? WHERE id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String VALIDATE_LOGIN_QUERY "SELECT id, username, password, approved FROM logins WHERE username = ? AND password = ?"
